description:
Based in Nashville, Tennessee, Mosaic Consulting Group helps businesses of all sizes and across all industries leverage their investment in UKG HCM & WFM Technologies. We are more than a consulting company; we are a highly skilled team delivering value and exceptional service to our clients. Every day we strive to live up to our promise: Make a difference and inspire confidence. Because of our dedication to client and team experience, we have been recognized on the Inc. 5000 list for 4 consecutive years and are certified as a Great Place to Work.

We are looking for a remote VP of Business Development & Marketing to serve as a leader for Mosaic on the Executive team, and lead the Client Engagement and Marketing teams. In this role, you would oversee our net-new sales team and processes to help us achieve our sales and revenue goals.

What you’ll do:
• Create and execute on Client Engagement team strategy, including revenue targets, pricing strategies, and alignment to our sales methodology
• Focus on building a consultative sales approach and fostering this approach within the team
• Leverage your industry expertise to partner with our prospective clients and recommend solutions that are in line with industry trends and market conditions
• Build relationships with various channels to expand Mosaic’s footprint and drive long term, mutually beneficial partnerships. This includes building relationships with the Global Alliance team and Sales team within UKG
• Lead, engage, and mentor your team to accomplish developmental and company goals, most notably team revenue goals
• Partner with team members throughout the company to hone our sales to service processes
• Own sales data and provide weekly updates to executive team on revenue projections, sales pipeline, and other data as needed

What makes you successful:

Need to haves:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience
• 8-10+ years of Professional Services sales experience
• 5+ years of experience in the HCM industry
• Experience building, leading and motivating a high growth, fast-paced sales team
• Ability to travel as needed
• Effective leadership and team building skills
• Strong relationships within UKG implementation partner ecosystem
• UKG product experience (UltiPro & Kronos)

How you’ll be measured:
• Achievement of revenue goals
• Achievement of EBITDA goals
• Building a team of 80% stars through hiring, skill development, and removing under performers
• Increasing average closed/won deal size
• Building strategic partnerships in the ecosystem and beyond

What we offer you:
• The ability to put your sales philosophies to the test and lead a high-growth sales practice
• An opportunity to learn the ins and outs of a small and rapidly growing business
• A competitive salary with 25% bonus potential, and comprehensive benefits and PTO package
• Deferred profit sharing, stipend for reading books, wellness program, and other unique perks like unlimited time off
